DOC.brief_summary: Primary Aim : To test efficacy elementary school-based , school nurse-led weight management program reduce excess weight gain among child , 8 12 year old overweight risk overweight increase healthy dietary practice physical activity level decrease sedentary practice . Primary Hypothesis : Relative control condition , child receive intervention significantly low body mass index ( BMI ) , follow implementation 9-month intervention , control baseline value .
DOC.brief_title: School Nurse-directed Secondary Obesity Prevention Elementary School Children
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Hypothesis : Relative control condition , child receive intervention significantly low body mass index ( BMI ) , follow implementation 9-month intervention , control baseline value .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria child participant : 3rd 4th 5th grade student year intervention implement , ≥ 8 ≤ 12 year old , age genderadjusted BMI ≥ 75th percentile , child must live primary residence participate parent Exclusion Criteria child participant : plan move outside school district within next 12 month , food allergy , physical limitation , medical condition prohibit participation intervention program measurement , speak write English .
